name: Sugar Shot
description:
In this short game, a small girl shoots spoons at cupcake monsters to get points as well as collecting glazed cherries for health and more points!

==Controls==
L-Mouse – Fire
A+D – Left+Right movement
Space – Jump

==Win/Lose Conditions==
Win – Reach the candy cane at the right side of the level
Lose – Your hearts are reduced to 0
